Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player
public class Player
extends Observable<Message>
Represent one of the 2 or 3 players that play the match

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String username, Game session, Color color)
      Constructor of the class Player.

      The constructor initializes every possible move (of the player menu) at false value.

      Parameters:
      username - name of the Player
      session - reference of the Game session
      color - Color of the player

  • Method Details

    • getCard

      public God getCard()

    • setCard

      public void setCard​(God card) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Set the choosen God
      Parameters:
      card - the card to be assigned to the player
      Throws:
      SimpleGameException - if the Game is simple
      CardAlreadySetException - if the Player has already a God
      java.lang.RuntimeException - if the God doesn't exist
      java.lang.NullPointerException
